page.title: 11THE BELL INN
page.content: Jim Rickard is my Grandad, he owns the Bell Inn. The Bell Inn is 700 years old and its was built in 1300.The dinning room used to be the old blacksmith shop where they shoed all the horses long ago.In the grounds there is a holiday cottage which was converted from the old granary which was where they stored the grain to keep it dry. Outside there is a thatched roof. In side is an old open fire and there are antique chairs and table. There is a new bar it is covered with copper. Games are played in the pub such as darts and a card game called euchre.In the ladies darts team there are six ladies and in the mens darts team there are eight men. My mum works at the pub she does the cooking. There is a little garden with seats & tables. {Abigail Sargant
